title: Lips Lips Revolution
description: lipsyncing karaoke game. won 'best use of mongodb' and hr for 'best use of symphonic labs api' @HTN in <36 hours. 40+ in person users. reverse engineered api to reduce latency (30s â†’ 7s).

title: Pixel Pets
description: obsidian plugin to add virtual pets to your obsidian dom. features include pet interactivity and a context aware c(h)at bot. 1900+ downloads and counting. still actively maintained and updated.

title: Cigym
description: cursor for cinematic gym videos. python script + gui to automate editing gym videos (reduce time spent by 3x). still actively maintained.

title: Merivale Drama Manager
description: drama organization and scheduling manager for merivale hs. automated emailing to absentees with qr code attendance. containerized development with docker.

title: BeProud
description: platform to combat body dysmporphia. won best solo pitch @Terrahacks in 36 hours with 20+ real users.

title: Proteful
description: mobile app to keep protesting safe. won overall first place ($1000) @Hack404 in <24 hours. realtime updating with firebase. dynamic routing using an a* algorithm.

title: FRC 8729 Attendance Bot
description: attendance bot to track commitment of robotics team. 90+ users.

title: VocalizeVC
description: discord bot to provide more functionality to discord calls. includes captions, individual meeting stats, meeting summaries.

title: FRC 8729 Software
description: code for the 2025 frc game 'reefscape'. slew rate limited swerve drive and photonvision april tag detection.

title: STEM-E Volunteer App
description: platform to automate volunteering and support access to stem opportunities. 1000+ future users.

title: ConvoAI
description: ai assistant to help pass interviews. provides personalized answers to both technical and behavioral interview questions in real time. made @jamhacks8.

title: Study Sphere
description: web app for studying (similar to reddit) with features like posts, comments and tags. made @uottahack6.
